thread.title: Meiji Christmas-New Year Sale: Up to 75% Discount on Digital Gadgets and Home Appliances!
thread.title_full: Meiji Christmas-New Year Sale: Up to 75% Discount on Digital Gadgets and Home Appliances!

author: time news
title: Meiji Christmas-New Year Sale: Up to 75% Discount on Digital Gadgets and Home Appliances!
text:
2023-12-28 22:30:00
Meiji Christmas-New Year Sale Offers Up to 75% Discount on Electronics and Appliances
Kozhikode: Meiji, the popular digital gadgets and home appliances network, is celebrating the Christmas season with a spectacular sale at its over 100 showrooms. The ongoing sale, which extends to the New Year, offers customers the opportunity to avail of discounts of up to 75% across all product segments.
One of the main attractions of the sale is the special offer of Rs 1500 cashback with every mobile and tablet purchase of Rs 10,000 or more. This offer is applicable to all major mobile phone and tablet brands, including Samsung, Apple, Redmi, Vivo, Oppo, Nokia, and One Plus, all of which are available at discounted prices.
In addition to the discounts on mobile phones and tablets, Meiji is also offering special prices on all laptop models. Customers can avail low Meiji special prices on laptops, with select models providing an additional Rs 4,000 cashback and a two-year warranty. Furthermore, consumers can also enjoy affordable prices on printers during the sale.
For those in need of new kitchen appliances, Meiji is providing special prices on various products, as well as a cashback offer of Rs 2000 on all models of single-door refrigerators.
The ongoing Christmas-New Year sale at Meiji is a great opportunity for customers to upgrade their electronic devices and household appliances at unbeatable prices. For more information and details on the special offers, customers are encouraged to contact Meiji at the provided phone number: 9249001001. Donâ€™t miss out on these amazing discounts and cashback offers this holiday season.
#Meiji #ChristmasNew #Year #sale #continues #business
